pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calling Haplotype-Based and Variant-Based Pedigree Disequilibrium Test for Rare Variants in Pedigrees // To detecting rare variants for binary traits using general pedigrees, the pedigree disequilibrium tests are proposed by collapsing rare haplotypes/variants with/without weights. To run the test, MERLIN is needed in Linux for haplotyping.
